Docs.summary: Contains metadata about an item, such as the title, artist, etc.

remarks.para: Contains metadata about an item, such as the title, artist, etc.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Gets the width/height limit (in pixels) for the bitmaps when this metadata was created.

remarks.para: Gets the width/height limit (in pixels) for the bitmaps when this metadata was created. This method always returns a positive value.
If it returns Integer#MAX_VALUE, then no scaling down was applied to the bitmaps when this metadata was created.
If it returns another positive value, then all the bitmaps in this metadata has width/height not greater than this limit. Bitmaps may have been scaled down according to the limit.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the text value associated with the given key as a String, or null if no mapping of the desired type exists for the given key or a null value is explicitly associated with the key.

remarks.para: Returns the text value associated with the given key as a String, or null if no mapping of the desired type exists for the given key or a null value is explicitly associated with the key. This is equivalent to calling #getText getText().toString() if the value is not null.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The album title for the media.

remarks.para: The album title for the media.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The artwork for the album of the media's original source as a Bitmap.

remarks.para: The artwork for the album of the media's original source as a Bitmap.
The artwork should be relatively small and may be scaled down by the system if it is too large. For higher resolution artwork #METADATA_KEY_ALBUM_ART_URI should be used instead.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The artist for the album of the media's original source.

remarks.para: The artist for the album of the media's original source.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The artwork for the album of the media's original source as a Uri formatted String.

remarks.para: The artwork for the album of the media's original source as a Uri formatted String. The artwork can be loaded using a combination of ContentResolver#openInputStream and BitmapFactory#decodeStream.

For the best results, Uris should use the content:// style and support ContentResolver#EXTRA_SIZE for retrieving scaled artwork through ContentResolver#openTypedAssetFileDescriptor(Uri, String, Bundle).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The artwork for the media as a Bitmap.

remarks.para: The artwork for the media as a Bitmap.
The artwork should be relatively small and may be scaled down by the system if it is too large. For higher resolution artwork #METADATA_KEY_ART_URI should be used instead.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The artist of the media.

remarks.para: The artist of the media.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The artwork for the media as a Uri formatted String.

remarks.para: The artwork for the media as a Uri formatted String. The artwork can be loaded using a combination of ContentResolver#openInputStream and BitmapFactory#decodeStream.

For the best results, Uris should use the content:// style and support ContentResolver#EXTRA_SIZE for retrieving scaled artwork through ContentResolver#openTypedAssetFileDescriptor(Uri, String, Bundle).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The author of the media.

remarks.para: The author of the media.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The bluetooth folder type of the media specified in the section 6.

remarks.para:
The bluetooth folder type of the media specified in the section 6.10.2.2 of the Bluetooth AVRCP 1.5. It should be one of the following:
  • MediaDescription#BT_FOLDER_TYPE_MIXED
  • MediaDescription#BT_FOLDER_TYPE_TITLES
  • MediaDescription#BT_FOLDER_TYPE_ALBUMS
  • MediaDescription#BT_FOLDER_TYPE_ARTISTS
  • MediaDescription#BT_FOLDER_TYPE_GENRES
  • MediaDescription#BT_FOLDER_TYPE_PLAYLISTS
  • MediaDescription#BT_FOLDER_TYPE_YEARS
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The compilation status of the media.

remarks.para: The compilation status of the media.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The composer of the media.

remarks.para: The composer of the media.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The date the media was created or published.

remarks.para: The date the media was created or published. The format is unspecified but RFC 3339 is recommended.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The disc number for the media's original source.

remarks.para: The disc number for the media's original source.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A description that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: A description that is suitable for display to the user. When displaying more information for media described by this metadata this should be preferred to other fields if present.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: An icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: An icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user. When displaying an icon for media described by this metadata this should be preferred to other fields if present. This must be a Bitmap.
The icon should be relatively small and may be scaled down by the system if it is too large. For higher resolution artwork #METADATA_KEY_DISPLAY_ICON_URI should be used instead.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A Uri formatted String for an icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: A Uri formatted String for an icon or thumbnail that is suitable for display to the user. When displaying more information for media described by this metadata the display description should be preferred to other fields when present. The icon can be loaded using a combination of ContentResolver#openInputStream and BitmapFactory#decodeStream.

For the best results, Uris should use the content:// style and support ContentResolver#EXTRA_SIZE for retrieving scaled artwork through ContentResolver#openTypedAssetFileDescriptor(Uri, String, Bundle).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A subtitle that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: A subtitle that is suitable for display to the user. When displaying a second line for media described by this metadata this should be preferred to other fields if present.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A title that is suitable for display to the user.

remarks.para: A title that is suitable for display to the user. This will generally be the same as #METADATA_KEY_TITLE but may differ for some formats. When displaying media described by this metadata this should be preferred if present.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The duration of the media in ms.

remarks.para: The duration of the media in ms. A negative duration indicates that the duration is unknown (or infinite).
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: The genre of the media.

remarks.para: The genre of the media.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A String key for identifying the content.

remarks.para: A String key for identifying the content. This value is specific to the service providing the content. If used, this should be a persistent unique key for the underlying content. It may be used with MediaController.TransportControls#playFromMediaId(String, Bundle) to initiate playback when provided by a MediaBrowser connected to the same app.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: A Uri formatted String representing the content.

remarks.para: A Uri formatted String representing the content. This value is specific to the service providing the content. It may be used with MediaController.TransportControls#playFromUri(Uri, Bundle) to initiate playback when provided by a MediaBrowser connected to the same app.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
